pullRequest.title: Add sql SHOW MAPPINGS/JOBS stmt
pullRequest.bodyText:
The SHOW JOBS command shows all active jobs.
The SHOW MAPPINGS command is equivalent to SELECT mapping_name as name FROM information_schema.mappings.
Fixes #2731
